programme.title: D'Koplo Ep26
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Hidayah Cinta Ep28
programme.desc: Gia dianggap pembawa malang sejak lahir dan dijodohkan dengan Aslam yang terkena kutukan Mata Jahat. Masalah demi masalah berlaku selepas perkahwinan mereka. Aslam tidak mencintai Gia kerana hatinya hanya untuk Rati, bekas tunangan yang sangat disayanginya.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep42
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep40
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Dosen Selalu Benar Tapi Cintaku Juga Tak Pernah Salah
programme.desc: Pada hari pertama Neysa masuk kuliah dan menjalani orientasi, kakinya dilanggar motor milik Rendy di tempat parkir. Neysa terus marah kerana menganggap Rendy, yang merupakan seniornya di kampus, sengaja ingin mempermainkannya. Namun, Rendy tidak menghiraukan kata-kata Neysa. Beberapa ketika kemudian, Rendy dan Neysa bertemu lagi. Kali ini, motor mereka bertembung. Neysa kembali marah, tetapi sekali lagi, Rendy tidak mempedulikannya.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 2024 Ep12
programme.desc: Karnaval SCTV merupakan sebuah rancangan varieti yang disiarkan di SCTV dan datang ke bandar anda. Ia dimeriahkan oleh para pelakon sinetron SCTV serta pemuzik tanah air. Karnaval SCTV kali ini hadir di Madiun dengan tetamu istimewa yang mengejutkan

programme.title: Hidayah Cinta Ep28
programme.desc: Gia dianggap pembawa malang sejak lahir dan dijodohkan dengan Aslam yang terkena kutukan Mata Jahat. Masalah demi masalah berlaku selepas perkahwinan mereka. Aslam tidak mencintai Gia kerana hatinya hanya untuk Rati, bekas tunangan yang sangat disayanginya.

programme.title: Hati Tak Pernah Salah
programme.desc: Bimo mempunyai seorang anak bersama Celin, tetapi Celin meninggal dunia akibat penyakit yang parah. Chika yang tidak dapat melupakan ibunya yang telah meninggal, tiba-tiba bertemu dengan Anjani yang sedang mencari pekerjaan. Ibu Bimo menawarkan Anjani untuk menjadi pengasuh Chika, tetapi Bimo tidak menyukainya. Mampukah Bimo meneruskan kehidupan demi kebahagiaan anaknya?

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 2 Ep9
programme.desc: Musim kedua program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun kini kembali. Ikuti musim ini untuk menyaksikan bakat-bakat muda yang hebat dalam dunia penghafalan al-Quran.

programme.title: Mega Series Suara Hati Istri: Anjani Ep3
programme.desc: Anjani berkahwin dengan Ammar melalui perkahwinan yang diatur, namun malangnya Ammar tidak mencintai Anjani, terutamanya selepas mengetahui bahawa Anjani sukar untuk hamil. Akhirnya, Anjani mengambil anak angkat yang ternyata mempunyai rahsia masa lalu dalam kehidupan suaminya.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati Ep48
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaan. Dalam usaha menyara kedua anaknya, Salwa bekerja keras setelah ditinggalkan suaminya. Namun, keamanan keluarga kecil ini diganggu oleh peristiwa besar yang berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Cowok Goat Bikin Terheran-Heran
programme.desc: Berawal dari Dafri menukarkan kupon berisi wang sebanyak 33 juta di resort tempat Tammy bekerja, dan kemudian berubah menjadi kupon cinta bagi mereka berdua."

programme.title: Keajaiban Cinta Ep42
programme.desc: Siri ini diarahkan oleh Gita Asmara dan dibintangi oleh Aliando Syarief, Sitha Marino, dan Erdin Werdrayana. Kisah Keajaiban Cinta berkisar tentang Darwin (lakonan Aliando Syarief) dan Tiana (lakonan Sitha Marino). Mereka menghadapi pertikaian keluarga yang menghalang hubungan mereka. Darwin telah ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya sejak kecil.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Hello Ghost
programme.desc: A man has many failed suicide attempts. After the most recent one, he discovers he can see a family of ghosts. The ghosts agree to leave him alone under the condition that he fulfill their requests.

programme.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: Highway Family
programme.desc: A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.

programme.title: Spiritwalker

programme.title: Da Capo
programme.desc: A frustrated songwriter met his old bandmate and a school band "Destroyer", who inspired him to complete an unfinished track...

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.desc: The top brand leader has sent their youth dance team to the famous 7th District, the ultimate destination for outstanding dancers, to battle for the last position. The young dancers, led by organizer Zhu Zhengting and special coaches Even Wong and NAME, are continually competing and performing to win a badge for their brand. These dedicated young people are giving it their best. Which team will ultimately become China's strongest youth dancing squad?

programme.title: Wu Liang Shrine Ep2
programme.desc: This historical and cultural film takes the "Wu Liang Shrine" as the first batch of key cultural heritage sites in New China. It focuses on the stone carved murals of the "Wu Liang Shrine", which have been of great interest to Chinese scholars since the Song dynasty.Through these intricate stone carvings, the film delves deep into the stories of numerous figures spanning across ancient and modern times. It provides an in-depth exploration of the historical, artistic, and ideological value of the Wu Liang Shrine.

programme.title: Study On The Island Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The bookstore is located in the healing Dong'ao Island of Zhuhai; it mainly focuses on the relationship between a certain emotion and literature in people's daily life; through the dialogue and exchange of "bookstore managers", which spiritual healing is obtained from it.

programme.title: The Inheritors Season 3 Ep15
programme.desc: Intangible Cultural Heritage refers to the behavior or performance which is important for cultural inheritance in a certain district, such as folk custom, culture, beliefs, traditions, etc. As the theme of this program, the results of protection of intangible cultural heritage could be demonstrated and promoted comprehensively.

programme.title: Rap Star Dream Maker (Repackaged) Ep5
programme.desc: Jay Chou gathered Will Liu, Dylan Wang, and four label managers GAI & Bridge, MC Jin, Xiao Gui, Air & Zao An, VaVa, and D-SHINE, they provide escort and support for the new generation of rap artists in their dream pursuit journey. Breaking from the traditional mentor-led model, they established true mentor-mentee relationships to co-create unique rap labels, and aim to inspire rapper creativity through competitive performances to find the next rap superstar.

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep7
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: Tenday Ep12
programme.desc: 39 well-known competitors from a variety of industries, including Nicky Wu, Michelle Chen, Neo Hou, Lin Gengxin, and Shen Yue, are invited to participate in an immersive survival reality TV series. They will encounter tasks that will put their cooperation, mental, physical, and psychological faculties to the test. The champion will be the ultimate victor.

Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: Whisper’s dishes Season 4 Ep10
programme.desc: Gourmet food as the media of the new cultural interview program, each episode invited cultural celebrities, celebrity chefs, foreign handsome men, live network red and folk gourmets guests together to visit the meal, in tasting folk delicious at the same time, share the life story.

programme.title: Ready To Dance Ep2
programme.desc: The top brand leader has sent their youth dance team to the famous 7th District, the ultimate destination for outstanding dancers, to battle for the last position. The young dancers, led by organizer Zhu Zhengting and special coaches Even Wong and NAME, are continually competing and performing to win a badge for their brand. These dedicated young people are giving it their best. Which team will ultimately become China's strongest youth dancing squad?

programme.title: Wu Liang Shrine Ep2
programme.desc: This historical and cultural film takes the "Wu Liang Shrine" as the first batch of key cultural heritage sites in New China. It focuses on the stone carved murals of the "Wu Liang Shrine", which have been of great interest to Chinese scholars since the Song dynasty.Through these intricate stone carvings, the film delves deep into the stories of numerous figures spanning across ancient and modern times. It provides an in-depth exploration of the historical, artistic, and ideological value of the Wu Liang Shrine.

programme.title: Cooking with Nino and Chang Ep1
programme.desc: Nino, chef de cuisine at an Italian restaurant, and Chang combine the food with Eastern and Western cultures, to share and demonstrate some creative recipes!

programme.title: Pet Doctor Season 2 Ep8
programme.desc: This program records all kinds of cute pets, showing warmth and healing and professionalism to convey warmth, easier to connect and understand with sincerity. Lets have a new understanding of pet doctors.

programme.title: The Charm of Jiangsu You’re Never Known Ep8
programme.desc: Led by Meng Fei, an exploration team is embarking on a journey through the province of Jiangsu in China. Comprised of academic experts, cultural celebrities, and exceptional local youth, their mission is to delve into the fascinating towns, unearthing the rich history and cultural significance that lies within. The initiative aims to attract more tourists to Jiangsu and allow them to experience the "flavorful life."

programme.title: Whisper’s dishes Season 4 Ep10
programme.desc: Gourmet food as the media of the new cultural interview program, each episode invited cultural celebrities, celebrity chefs, foreign handsome men, live network red and folk gourmets guests together to visit the meal, in tasting folk delicious at the same time, share the life story.

programme.title: 90’s Dating Agency Season 2 Ep12
programme.desc: Meng Fei is continuously to be invited as the host, formed with Gillian Chung, Xu Yiyang, and Han Zhuo as Love Consultants, for advising 8 young ladies and gentlemen to participate dating event. Special accommodation arrangement will be provided if two parties are successfully matched. What a romantic dating opportunities!

programme.title: WOW Club Ep9
programme.desc: Six comedians from Northeast China, Jian Jun Tang, Xiaoli Wang, Bing Yang, Song Wen, Tianwa and Yunpeng Zhou, are invited to join the first Northeast characteristic comedy detective variety show. They visit towns and cities from a new perspective and look for childhood memories, bringing witty real-time interaction, three-dimensional display of the amazing urban style and cultural charm of the region.

programme.title: Let's Go, Lovely Pets Ep5
programme.desc: Pets, led by their "Pet Parent," travel to Shanghai, Dali, and Shenzhen, showcasing diverse pet travel experiences. From cities to the countryside, forests to beaches, the audience witnesses unique ways of traveling with pets while discovering animal rescue initiatives for stray animals and fostering harmonious relationships between humans and pets.

programme.title: Her Disguise Ep7
programme.desc: Her Disguise

programme.title: Rap Star Dream Maker (Repackaged) Ep6
programme.desc: Jay Chou gathered Will Liu, Dylan Wang, and four label managers GAI & Bridge, MC Jin, Xiao Gui, Air & Zao An, VaVa, and D-SHINE, they provide escort and support for the new generation of rap artists in their dream pursuit journey. Breaking from the traditional mentor-led model, they established true mentor-mentee relationships to co-create unique rap labels, and aim to inspire rapper creativity through competitive performances to find the next rap superstar.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep278
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep143
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4965
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1952
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3443
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2997
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Walker Fun Kaohsiung (M) Ep224225
programme.desc: Walker Fun Kaohsiung is a travel reality show that takes viewers on an exciting journey through the vibrant city of Kaohsiung. With 35 different routes, the show explores the citys hidden gems, local culture, and unique experiences. From bustling night markets to serene temples, Walker Fun Kaohsiung showcases the best of Kaohsiung.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep28
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Taichung Player (M) Ep6061
programme.desc: The vibrant Chin-Lan Chang hosts a captivating journey through Taichung's cultural and creative industries, unique attractions, community initiatives, local arts, and heartfelt human stories. This show offers a rich blend of fun and learning, ensuring every moment is both enjoyable and enlightening.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep639
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep974
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep89
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Taichung Player (M) Ep6061
programme.desc: The vibrant Chin-Lan Chang hosts a captivating journey through Taichung's cultural and creative industries, unique attractions, community initiatives, local arts, and heartfelt human stories. This show offers a rich blend of fun and learning, ensuring every moment is both enjoyable and enlightening.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep28
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1060
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep71
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep974975
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep741
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep516
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep23
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughter-in-law wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep71
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep23
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughter-in-law wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep71
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep974975
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep741
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3443
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep62
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1953
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep144
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4966
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xus life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Soul Mate
programme.desc: July and An Sheng have been best friends since they were thirteen. They always believed their friendship would last forever, until they meet Su Jia Ming at the age of eighteen. The trio find themselves in a love triangle, which puts the girls friendship to the test and alters their destinies.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kongs greatest filmmakers. It traces Huis life story and her 40-year careers ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Mings guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this sumptuous version was said to be the most successful one. Loh Tihs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: Pursuit Of A Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friends grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperors tomb.

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Pursuit Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chens past insult.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep50
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep60
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep59
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep42
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep43
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Oh My Lallan Ep42

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 4
programme.desc: Things get hairy for the hunters as some ring in the money while others go for broke. Desert Dan returns to turn up the heat as T Money continues to march to the beat of his own drum. In a quest to protect their territory, Brandon and Lori go to battle for a bin that could prove to be their most profitable yet.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 5
programme.desc: T Money puts his honesty to the test with shocking revelations. Jesse finds a loser bin that could make him a winner. Brandon and Lori think they see treasure in an unlikely place. And the new kids in town are determined to throw everyone off their game.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 6
programme.desc: In a day filled with explosive surprises, Team Brandori looks for a big win as the Alvarado Brothers take a gamble and let the pros get under their skin. A fiery contraption has T Money wondering if he scored big or will go down in flames.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the early 1960s, at the height of the Cold War, THE MAN FROM U.N.C.L.E. centers on CIA agent Solo (Man of Steel's Henry Cavill) and KGB agent Kuryakin (The Social Network's Armie Hammer). Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Malachi - When Jack's girlfriend says she's going to dinner with a male friend, a jealous Jack tags along. Principal Durbin, Mary, Stef and Michelle take Helen out to cheer her up after a breakup.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep8
programme.desc: The Harvard Pen - Jack is enraged to find that the A.P. Bio students have stolen his beloved Harvard pen after he asked them not to touch it. Principal Durbin and Helen repeatedly fail the superintendent's inspections.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot: Catfish - WhenHarvardphilosophyscholar Jack Griffin finds himself teaching high school inToledo, he tosses the syllabus and recruits his students to help mentally break his dream-job-stealing nemesis Miles Leonard.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep2
programme.desc: Teacher Jail - Despite his love of teacher jail where he's paid to not teach, Jack betrays the boisterous union rep who got him there in favor of Principal Durbin.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep3
programme.desc: Overachieving Virgins - While Principal Durbin struggles with budget cuts, Jack discovers his students pity him so he rallies, making a splash at the school bake sale and getting kicked out of the bookstore for life.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep4
programme.desc: Burning Miles - Jack gets into a petty dispute with Marcus, the President of Student Council, who surprisingly refuses to back down, causing the situation to escalate much too far.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep5
programme.desc: Dating Toledoans - Jack, who has been taking buses to New York to meet dates, is convinced to let Stef, Mary, and Michelle show him how to enjoy Toledo. Principal Durbin finds out that his announcements have not been as well received.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep6
programme.desc: Freakin' Enamored - When Jack is attracted to Colin's mother at a parentteacher conference, he feigns interest in her son only to have it backfire.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep7
programme.desc: Selling Out - After Jack receives an offer from Miles's publisher to write a book of feel-good philosophy, he enlists the help of Helen in hopes of using the deal as his ticket out of Toledo.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep8
programme.desc: We Don't Party - Jack finds out his ex-girlfriend needs a venue for a charity fundraiser and suggests a student's house. The kids are inspired by Jack to party for the first time.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep9
programme.desc: Rosemary's Boyfriend - Jack is incensed when his dead mom's former lover shows up and suggests they celebrate her birthday; Jack taps his students to help him retaliate, but they are busy caring for robot babies.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep10
programme.desc: Durbin Crashes - Jack takes in Durbin after giving him marriage advice that backfires and gets him kicked out of the house; the kids try to help Jack get revenge against Miles.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep11
programme.desc: Eight Pigs And A Rat - The class receives a shipment of fetal pigs for dissection, but Jack cancels the dissection and fails an attempt at shooting the pigs at Miles.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep12
programme.desc: Walleye - Jack successfully convinces Miles that Devin is his illegitimate son; Durbin, Mary, Stef and Michelle clash on the Sadie Hawkins dance theme.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep13
programme.desc: Drenching Dallas - Jack takes interest in a revenge mission on behalf of the kids; Mary, Stef and Michelle believe they've discovered an otherworldly presence.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Happiness - Jack attempts to unlock the secret of what makes ordinary people happy, leading him to an idea for a new book that he believes will be his ticket out of Whitlock High.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Nuns - As the newly minted driver's education teacher, Jack sets out to get revenge on his mother's church when he discovers the last of her money was used to buy a statue of the Virgin Mary.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Wednesday Morning, 8AM - In the hectic 30 minutes that start every day at Whitlock, Jack tries to retrieve his massage chair from Whitlock's intriguing payroll accountant, Lynette. Durbin and Helen prepare for the morning announcements.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Toledo's Top 100 - Jack is aghast to learn he didn't make the top 10 in Toledo's Top 100 Bachelors, and Durbin did. Victor and Eduardo decide it's time to reveal their feelings to their crushes.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep5
programme.desc: J'Accuse - Jack tries to impress Lynette using Michelle's annual murder mystery party as a distraction. Plus, desperate students break into Whitlock High to steal the AP biology practice exams.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Melvin - Jack's war with his neighbor Melvin reaches a turning point when it threatens a potential date with Lynette.The school photographer increases his payment rate, so Durbin comes up with his own plan for school picture day.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Personal Everest - Jack is furious when his former high school bully is hired as a motivational speaker at Whitlock. Plus, Mary, Stef and Michelle set their own personal goals for female empowerment, accidentally causing a rift between Helen and Durbin.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Sweet Low Road - When budget cuts threaten to gut Whitlock and put his job in jeopardy, Jack recruits Mary, Stef and Michelle to take down the superintendent. Durbin plans an appeal to the heart, while the students appeal to the soul.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Dr. Whoopsie - When an embarrassing video of him falling off a stage goes viral, Jack plans a viral video of his own. Plus, Durbin, Helen and the teachers hunt down Whitlock's most notorious litterer known as The Sugar Daddy.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Handcuffed - When he's kicked off his Harvard phone plan, Jack is offered a chance to leapfrog onto Mary's on one condition, he must help her break up with her scuzzy boyfriend. Anthony becomes Durbin's right-hand man.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Spectacle - When his computer breaks, Jack rallies his class to win the annual Whitlock's Got Talent competition so he can use the prize money for a new laptop.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Ride The Ram - It's the most exciting time of the year for Durbin's Birthday and Spirit Week. Jack does his best to steer clear of any school spirit as everyone else comes together to take down their hated rivals at Prairie High.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Kinda Sorta - Sarika has an offer for Jack when the university fair comes to Whitlock, get her into Harvard and she'll get his book to her publisher aunt. Plus Stef prepares for a visit from a fling, while Helen applies to university.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Tiny Problems - When Jack is disappointed with the popcorn maker he orders, he and the students plot revenge; Helen goes back to school to get her high school degree and chaos ensues in Principal Durbin's office in her absence.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Disgraced - Mr. Pugh plans a field trip for the Toledo chapter of the Ohio Naturalists; when Jack can't write his own book, he agrees to be ghostwrite for popular author Robin Shwank -- only to insert his own chapters into Shwank's book.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Gary Meets Dave - Jack accidentally loses a significant amount of money and it falls in the hands of the students; as Principal Durbin and Helen investigate who stole the money, the students and teachers admit to other wrongdoings.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Get Hoppy - Principle Durbin turns into a power-hungry maniac after self-publishing Jack's philosophy book.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Mr. Pistachio - Jack has Mary drive him to the doctor, but a prank results in him getting the same procedure twice; at school, Durbin and Helen embarrass themselves and the kids compete over class superlative titles.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep6
programme.desc: That That That - As the school prepares for winter break, Jack tries to record a lecture as a way into the University of Wisconsin's philosophy department; frustrated and unable to finish the video, he falls asleep and has nightmares.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Aces Wild - Helen has a vaping problem to overcome with the help of Durbin while Anthony's secret is revealed.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Katie Holmes Day - While the rest of the town prepares for the celebration of Toledo's annual Katie Holmes Day, Jack and Marissa plot to ruin the holiday pageant.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Tornado! - A tornado puts the school on lockdown and Helen believes it's coming specifically for her. The kids pass the time by writing fan fiction, "shipping" various combinations of faculty members.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweatpants - Jack has the students form a fake cult to sabotage Principal Durbin's new school uniforms. Mary, Stef and Michelle prepare to see one of their favorite artists who is in town to perform.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep3
programme.desc: An Oath To Rusty - Jack attempts to get closer with the guys at work by inviting them over for a game night. Helen helps Principal Durbin grow a backbone. Stef and Mary try to coax information out of Michelle about a court case.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Tons Of Rue - When the A.P. Bio students reunite Jack with his deadbeat dad, Jack plots revenge by trying to expose his allegedly reformed father. A witch foretells of a grim future for Mary, Stef and Michelle that divides the women.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep5
programme.desc: The Perfect Date From Hell - When Jack discovers his new girlfriend's therapy homework requires dating him, he turns the tables on her. Principal Durbin goes undercover to determine which faculty member is most worthy of a very special prize.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Love, For Lack Of A Better Term - Victor attempts to catch up to his peers and become a man by sending Ashlanda a risqu photo. Grace and Anthony try to "Parent Trap" Mary and Principal Durbin after overhearing a conversation on single adults.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Malachi - When Jack's girlfriend says she's going to dinner with a male friend, a jealous Jack tags along. Principal Durbin, Mary, Stef and Michelle take Helen out to cheer her up after a breakup.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep8
programme.desc: The Harvard Pen - Jack is enraged to find that the A.P. Bio students have stolen his beloved Harvard pen after he asked them not to touch it. Principal Durbin and Helen repeatedly fail the superintendent's inspections.

programme.desc: Jamie Kassman takes on a temporary job as a nanny for her idol, multimillionnaire Walter Page. Things start off great but when his advances get rejected, his intentions quickly go from inappropriate to deadly.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: Clive Owen and Naomi Watts star in an adrenaline-pumping, action-packed thrill ride about a man determined to deliver justice to a corrupt international arms-dealing ringthat funds worldwide genocide and terrorism...no matter the cost!

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: A newly-single yuppie's new roommate acquires more than just a room. Stylish, adrenaline-laced thriller stars Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh.

programme.title: Super Eruption
programme.desc: Super Eruption is a non-stop thrill ride - the story of two people who come together to put a stop to one of the greatest natural disasters to ever threaten humanity

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: Matt Dillon, Idris Elba, Paul Walker and Hayden Christiansen star in this action-packed thriller full of twists and turns.

programme.title: The Kid Detective
programme.desc: A once-celebrated kid detective, now 31, continues to solve the same trivial mysteries until a client brings him his first 'adult' case - to find out who brutally murdered her boyfriend.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Commander - Volcano expert Chris Horsley returns to the Congo to investigate a potentially lethal threat to over two-million people. After a recent eruption, a huge 10-mile-long fracture has appeared in the ground. It runs directly from the slopes of Nyiragongo volcano down to lake Kivu.

programme.desc: We visit an extraordinary bridge that spans a vast valley and becomes the tallest in the world, and a luxury hotel was built upside down in an abandoned quarry in China.

programme.desc: Ben Stiller - World-renowned survivalistBear Gryllsmeets actorBen Stilleron the rugged mountains of the Isle of Skye in Northern Scotland, to go on a once in a lifetime adventure.

programme.desc: Caves - Caves contain some of the most dramatic and unusual phenomena in nature, including birds' nests made from saliva and fish that cling to walls.
